name: Découvre les Pays Du Monde
overview: Your child will have fun placing the countries and capitals of the world on a map thanks to this little program. A voice will guide you aftereach action. " Nope ! "Yes! " It's wrong ! After a while, the voice no longer wanted to speak to me, and the sound of a drum came to sanction each of my mistakes. I finished all my games with a high score... negative. Today, it is clear that I remain unrecoverable in geography; but it is not the fault of this software, rather well done. For the more adventurous, there is a game mode in which you will have to rank countries by area, population or GNP per capita (the data is of course from the end of the 80s).
